basics.name: Chikezie
basics.label: Contract Azure C# Developer Architect
basics.summary: I'm a developer specialized in C#. Currently, I'm deeply fascinated with large data, particularly streaming data via Azure Stream Analytics. I'm keen on exploring efficient ways to visualise vast datasets using Python and JavaScript libraries.

work.summary: Developing and architecting Azure integrations to modern best practice.
highlights: Extensive software engineering background since 2006 (C++, C#, Javascript, React, Angular, Web API, .Net Core)
Highly experienced Developer, Team Lead and Azure Technical Architect with 15+ years of experience as a C# .Net developer, SQL and Azure devops.
Experience in designing and implementing scalable cloud solutions for clients. Extensive knowledge of Azure services and technologies, including PaaS, IaaS, and SaaS.
Understanding of cloud migration, cloud security, and DevOps processes.
Proven ability to lead, communicate and effectively manage multiple projects and priorities.

awards.title: Azure Administrator Associate
awards.summary: Demonstrated subject matter expertise in implementing, managing, and monitoring an organizationâ€™s Microsoft Azure environment.

awards.title: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
awards.summary: As a Microsoft Azure solutions architect, you have subject matter expertise in designing cloud and hybrid solutions that run on Azure.

references.name: 'One of the most professional and knowledgeable developers I've worked with' - Adam S (New Signature)
